description: The Daybreak Magnolia is truly a sight to behold! Its blooms are an exquisite pastel pink, providing an abundance of beauty in the garden or even in a vase as a cut flower. Its glossy, deep-green leaves are also attractive, and they provide stunning contrast to the pink blooms. This magnificent Magnolia tree grows slowly, so it won't overtake the garden, but its majestic form is a guarantee to bring something special to any landscape. It can also tolerate light frosts and is adaptable to a variety of soils, so it is a great choice for any gardener!
